channel.title: Blog
channel.description: A blog created with Next.js and Tailwind.css

item.title: Is Next.js 12 really a Beast?
item.description: Next.js is an open-source web and app development framework built on top of Node.js to accelerate React-based web and app development. It even features server-side rendering and static website generation.
item.author: address@yoursite.com (kumar deepanshu)
